mapper.insert: insert into document (doc_id, title, content, owner_id, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{docId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ownerId}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select d.*, u.nickname as ownerName from document d left join user u on d.owner_id = u.id where d.owner_id = #{ownerId} and d.status = 1 order by d.update_time desc
